price: 85. Waxaa khayr iyo barako badan (Allaah) ee iska leh Boqortooyada (runta ah ee) samooyinka iyo arlada iyo waxa u dhexeeya, oo ay agti tahay ogaanshaha Saacadda (Qiyaame), Xaggiisaana dib la idiinku soo celin.
arabic: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watabāraka alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā waʿindahu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
